method.text: Put one banana to one side. Peel the other bananas. Break up roughly and place in a food processor or blender. Process until smooth.
Transfer to a bowl. Stir in the honey, vanilla and creme fraiche.
Peel and slice the remaining banana. Toss in the lemon juice to help prevent discoloration.
Drain and stir into the cream mixture, reserving a few slices for decoration.
Stir in the remaining lemon juice. Spoon into a serving bowl and smooth over the surface. Sprinkle over the flake. Decorate with reserved slices of banana. Serve chilled.
